entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
